item.title: Help with my server (making myself owner) please read
item.dc:creator: @mod_robby mod robby
item.description:
@mod_robby wrote:

Stilles:

Do that, and go into Yourserver/Data/(staff, owner, admin) Matters what server base you’re using, add yourself to those and you will get your shiny crown

you don’t have to do that to make yourself have a shiny crown…All you have to do is what me and that other member posted…

Read full topic

item.title: Help with my server (making myself owner) please read
item.dc:creator: @mod_robby mod robby
item.description:
@mod_robby wrote:

[quote=“i ancients i, post:3, topic:109442”]ok don’t double post and go into character files and look for this
[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3252
character-posy = 3433
character-rights = 3
character-ismember = 1
character-messages = 0
owner 3, admin 2, mod 1[/quote]
Wrong go to character file then click what ever user you are then do what u said

Read full topic
